- Use semantic headings (H1 = title, H2 = sections).  
- Include page numbers and section headings for orientation.  
- Tag lists and tables properly so assistive devices can recognize them.

- Check the exported PDF in Adobe Acrobat’s “Accessibility Checker” or similar tool.
